data.message: Hello Facebook plz make my confusion clear or send me video tutorial for my question so that I will be clear... Since I have launched my business website and group I am receiving a notification that Facebook is testing ads in my group ..so what is it ? I just have 1.2k members and what I have to do further plz guide ..can I start earning money through it ...??

replies.message: Hey, Arif. For questions about ads or Pages, please reach out to our business team here: http://bit.ly/2m62qOt. Thanks! -Rhea
